alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Roane (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 25 at 10:12PM CDT until July 25 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... South Central Morgan County in east Tennessee... Northwestern Roane County in east Tennessee... * Until 1245 AM EDT. * At 1112 PM EDT, trained weather spotters reported thunderstorms had produced heavy rain across the warned area. Between 3 and 6 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Trained spotters reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Kingston, Rockwood, Midtown, Harriman, Oakdale, Pine Orchard, Dearmond and Coalfield. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
